title: Weni Commerce
description: Simplify the management of your business, maximize your sales and improve the customer experience with integrated tools.

abandoned_cart.title: Abandoned cart
abandoned_cart.description: Recover sales by reminding customers of items forgotten in the cart.
abandoned_cart.tip: With this solution, you can increase your chances of conversion by keeping your customer close and encouraging them to complete their order.

order_status.title: Order status
order_status.description: Inform your customers about the progress of their orders in real time.
order_status.tip: With this solution, it is possible to improve communication with the customer and reduce uncertainty about the purchasing process, increasing satisfaction and loyalty over time.

recurring_purchase.title: Recurring purchase
recurring_purchase.description: Facilitate the automatic purchase of products with a subscription solution.
recurring_purchase.tip: With this solution, you can increase customer retention and generate recurring sales, providing an effortless shopping experience for the consumer.

order_status_passive.title: Order status (Passive)
order_status_passive.description: Offer customers a practical way to check the status of their order.
order_status_passive.tip: With this solution, you reduce the volume of manual queries and improve transparency, allowing the customer to always feel informed and in control of the purchasing process.

refer_and_win.title: Refer and win
refer_and_win.description: Encourage customers to recommend your store to friends and family with a rewards program.
refer_and_win.tip: With this solution, you can expand your customer base organically and increase engagement, turning satisfied consumers into active promoters of your brand.
